title: Garment Medallion, 5th–6th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun two ply Z-twist linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool
Technique: slit tapestry with sulpplementary weft wrapping.
description: Part of a head and perhaps an animal.

tombstone.epitaph:
Garment Medallion, 5th–6th century.
5th–6th century. Medium: Warp; S-spun two ply Z-twist linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool
Technique: slit tapestry with sulpplementary weft wrapping.. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-27.
